a.n: Nobody combs me as well as the wind

p.k: Drama Italy (2014). Hrají: Laura Morante, Denisa Andreena Savin, Jacopo Olmo Antinori. Režie: Peter Del Monte.
p.d: No One Can Brush My Hair Like the Wind, a film that portrays the lives of many lonely souls in a desperate search for company. The difficult relationship between a woman writer who lives in solitude and a young girl who comes bursting into her life.
